00022 PowerStats::PowerStats()
00023 {
00024    Pow_PRE_PDN = 0.0;
00025    Pow_PRE_STBY = 0.0;
00026    Pow_ACT_PDN = 0.0;
00027    Pow_ACT_STBY = 0.0;
00028    Pow_REF = 0.0;
00029    Pow_ACT_PRE = 0.0;
00030    Pow_WR = 0.0;
00031    Pow_RD = 0.0;
00032    Pow_DQ = 0.0;
00033    Pow_termWR = 0.0;
00034    Pow_termRDoth = 0.0;
00035    Pow_termWRoth = 0.0;
00036    Pow_Term = 0.0;
00037    Pow_Bkg = 0.0;
00038    Pow_AP = 0.0;        
00039    Pow_RD_WR_Tr = 0.0;
00040    Pow_Total = 0.0;     
00041 }
00042 
00043 PowerStats::~PowerStats()
00044 {
00045 }
00046 
00047 void PowerStats::CalcPower(float BNK_PRE, float CLK_LO_PRE, float CLK_LO_ACT, float RDsch, 
00048                            float WRsch, float termRDsch, float termWRsch, float RRDsch )
00049 {
00050     Pow_PRE_PDN  = (IDD2PF*MaxVcc) * BNK_PRE * CLK_LO_PRE * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2) * (SysClk*1.0/1000)*t_CK;
00051 
00052     Pow_PRE_STBY  = (IDD2N*MaxVcc) * BNK_PRE * (1-CLK_LO_PRE) * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2) * (SysClk*1.0/1000)*t_CK;
00053 
00054     Pow_ACT_PDN  = (IDD3P*MaxVcc) * (1-BNK_PRE) * CLK_LO_PRE * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2) * (SysClk*1.0/1000)*t_CK;
00055 
00056     Pow_ACT_STBY  = (IDD3N*MaxVcc) * (1.0-BNK_PRE) * (1.0-CLK_LO_ACT) * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2) * (SysClk*1.0/1000)*t_CK; 
00057 
00058     Pow_REF       = (IDD5A - IDD3N) * tRFC/(tREFI*1000.0) * MaxVcc * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2);
00059 
00060     Pow_ACT_PRE   = ( IDD0 - (IDD3N*tRAS*1.0/tRC + IDD2N*(tRC-tRAS)*1.0/tRC) ) * MaxVcc * tRC*1.0/RRDsch * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2);
00061 
00062     Pow_WR        = (IDD4W - IDD3N) * MaxVcc * (8/BL) * WRsch * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2) * (SysClk*1.0/1000)*t_CK;
00063 
00064     Pow_RD        = (IDD4R - IDD3N) * MaxVcc * (8/BL) * RDsch * pow((SysVdd/MaxVcc),2) * (SysClk*1.0/1000)*t_CK;
00065 
00066     Pow_DQ        = (BL+DQS) * PdqRD * RDsch;
00067 
00068     Pow_termWR    = (BL+DQS+DM) * PdqWR * WRsch;
00069 
00070     Pow_termRDoth = (BL+DQS) * PdqRD * termRDsch;   
00071 
00072     Pow_termWRoth = (BL+DQS+DM) * PdqWR * termWRsch;   
00073 
00074     Pow_Term      = Pow_termWR + Pow_termRDoth + Pow_termWRoth;
00075 
00078 
00079     Pow_Bkg       = 9 * (Pow_PRE_PDN + Pow_PRE_STBY + Pow_ACT_PDN + Pow_ACT_STBY + Pow_REF);
00080 
00081     Pow_AP   = 9 * Pow_ACT_PRE;  
00082 
00083     Pow_RD_WR_Tr  = 9 * (Pow_RD + Pow_WR + Pow_DQ + Pow_Term); 
00084 
00085     Pow_Total     = Pow_Bkg + Pow_AP + Pow_RD_WR_Tr;
00086 
00087 }
00088 
00089 void Statistic::CollectStatsPerRequest(Request *req)
00090 {
00091  //   if (!(*doneOnce[req->threadId]))  
00092     {   
00094 
00095     avgLatPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] 
00096         = ( avgLatPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] * 1.0 / (reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] + 1) )
00097         * ( reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] * 1.0 )     
00098         + ( (req->retireTime - req->arrivalTime) * 1.0 / (reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] + 1) );
00099     
00100     avgThrottlePerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] 
00101         = ( avgThrottlePerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] * 1.0 / (reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] + 1) )
00102         * ( reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] * 1.0 )     
00103         + ( req->throttleTime * 1.0 / (reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] + 1) );
00104 
00105     reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo]++;  
00106     latPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] += (req->retireTime - req->arrivalTime);
00107     
00108     TotalFrontSideTimePerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] += (req->rbufferInsertionTime - req->arrivalTime);
00109     TotalQueueDelayPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] += (req->cbufferInsertionTime - req->rbufferInsertionTime);
00110     TotalCBufDelayPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] += (req->busInsertionTime - req->cbufferInsertionTime);
00111     TotalBusMemDelayPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] += (req->retireTime - req->busInsertionTime - 1);
00112 #ifdef DEBUG
00113     cout << "MC[" << ((MC*)mc)->id << "] " << req->address << ": " << Simulator::Now() 
00114         <<  ": Reached stats collection with arrival Time = "<< req->arrivalTime 
00115         << ", req buffer insertion time = " << req->rbufferInsertionTime 
00116         << " cmd queue insertion time = " << req->cbufferInsertionTime 
00117         << ", bus insertion time = " << req->busInsertionTime 
00118         << "and retire time = " << req->retireTime << endl;
00119 #endif
00120     //throttlePerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] += req->throttleTime;        
00121     if (req->status == OPEN)    
00122         hitsPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo]++;
00123     hitRatePerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] =  hitsPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] * 100.0
00124                                                          / reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo];  
00125     }
00126 //      cout << req->status << endl;
00127 //    cout << "Latency " << latPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] << endl;
00128 //    cout << "Average Latency " << avgLatPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] << endl;
00129 //    cout << "Requests " << reqPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] << endl;
00130 //    cout << "Hits " << hitsPerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] << endl;
00131 //    cout << "Hit Rate " << hitRatePerThreadPerBank[req->threadId][req->bankNo] << endl;
00132         
00133 }

00135 void Statistic::CollectStatsPerCycle()
00136 {
00137     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00138     {
00139         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00140         {
00141             for (unsigned int k=0; k<NO_OF_BUFFERS; k++)
00142             {
00143 //              if ( ((MC*)mc)->reqH->chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k].empty() )
00144 //                  emptyCycles[i][j][k]++;
00145 //              rbufferOccupancy[i][j][k] += ((MC*)mc)->reqH->chan[i].rank[j].rbuffer[k].size();
00146             }
00147         }
00148     }           
00149     
00150 }

00333 
00334 void Statistic::CalculateAggregateStats()
00335 {
00336     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00337     {
00338         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_RANKS; j++)
00339         {
00340             for (unsigned int k=0; k<NO_OF_BANKS; k++)
00341             {
00342                 if (((MC*)mc)->reqH->chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].bufferOccupancy != 0)
00343                     rbufferOccupancyRatio[i][j][k] = ((MC*)mc)->reqH->chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].bufferSize*1.0 / ((MC*)mc)->reqH->chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].bufferOccupancy;
00344                 
00345                 bufferFullCycles[i][j][k] = ((MC*)mc)->reqH->chan[i].rank[j].bank[k].bufferFullCounter;
00346             }
00347         }
00348     }           
00349     for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_BANKS; j++)
00350     {           
00351         for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)    
00352         {
00353             
00354             latPerBank[j] += latPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00355             throttlePerBank[j] += throttlePerThreadPerBank[i][j];       
00356             reqPerBank[j] += reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00357             hitsPerBank[j] += hitsPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00358             avgLatPerBank[j] += (avgLatPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00359             avgThrottlePerBank[j] += (avgThrottlePerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);           
00360         //    avgFrontSideTimePerBank[j] += (avgFrontSideTimePerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00361         //    avgQueueDelayPerBank[j] += (avgQueueDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00362         //    avgCBufDelayPerBank[j] += (avgCBufDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00363         //    avgBusMemDelayPerBank[j] += (avgBusMemDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);   
00364             TotalFrontSideTimePerBank[j] += TotalFrontSideTimePerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00365             TotalQueueDelayPerBank[j] += TotalQueueDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00366             TotalCBufDelayPerBank[j] += TotalCBufDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00367             TotalBusMemDelayPerBank[j] += TotalBusMemDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j];       
00368         }
00369         if (reqPerBank[j] !=0 ) 
00370         {
00371         avgLatPerBank[j] = avgLatPerBank[j] / reqPerBank[j];
00372         avgThrottlePerBank[j] = avgThrottlePerBank[j] / reqPerBank[j];
00373         hitRatePerBank[j] += hitsPerBank[j] * 100.0 / reqPerBank[j];
00374 
00375         avgFrontSideTimePerBank[j] = TotalFrontSideTimePerBank[j]*1.0 / reqPerBank[j];
00376         avgQueueDelayPerBank[j] = TotalQueueDelayPerBank[j]*1.0 / reqPerBank[j];
00377         avgCBufDelayPerBank[j] = TotalCBufDelayPerBank[j]*1.0 / reqPerBank[j];
00378         avgBusMemDelayPerBank[j] = TotalBusMemDelayPerBank[j]*1.0 / reqPerBank[j];      
00379         }
00380     }
00381     
00382     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)        
00383     {           
00384         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_BANKS; j++)
00385         { 
00386             latPerThread[i] += latPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00387             throttlePerThread[i] += throttlePerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00388             reqPerThread[i] += reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00389             hitsPerThread[i] += hitsPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00390             avgLatPerThread[i] += (avgLatPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00391             avgThrottlePerThread[i] += (avgThrottlePerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);         
00392         //    avgFrontSideTimePerThread[i] += (avgFrontSideTimePerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00393         //    avgQueueDelayPerThread[i] += (avgQueueDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00394         //    avgCBufDelayPerThread[i] += (avgCBufDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]);
00395         //    avgBusMemDelayPerThread[i] += (avgBusMemDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j] * reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j]); 
00396             TotalFrontSideTimePerThread[i] += TotalFrontSideTimePerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00397             TotalQueueDelayPerThread[i] += TotalQueueDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00398             TotalCBufDelayPerThread[i] += TotalCBufDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j];
00399             TotalBusMemDelayPerThread[i] += TotalBusMemDelayPerThreadPerBank[i][j];     
00400         }
00401         if (reqPerThread[i])
00402         {
00403         avgLatPerThread[i] = avgLatPerThread[i] / reqPerThread[i];
00404         avgThrottlePerThread[i] = avgThrottlePerThread[i] / reqPerThread[i];
00405         hitRatePerThread[i] += hitsPerThread[i] * 100.0 / reqPerThread[i];
00406         
00407         avgFrontSideTimePerThread[i] = TotalFrontSideTimePerThread[i]*1.0 / reqPerThread[i];
00408         avgQueueDelayPerThread[i] = TotalQueueDelayPerThread[i]*1.0 / reqPerThread[i];
00409         avgCBufDelayPerThread[i] = TotalCBufDelayPerThread[i]*1.0 / reqPerThread[i];
00410         avgBusMemDelayPerThread[i] = TotalBusMemDelayPerThread[i]*1.0 / reqPerThread[i];        
00411         }
00412     }
00413 
00415 
00416     for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_CHANNELS; i++)
00417     {
00418         RDsch = ((MC*)mc)->dram->dc[i].dramReadCycles / Simulator::Now();
00419         WRsch = ((MC*)mc)->dram->dc[i].dramWriteCycles/ Simulator::Now();
00420   
00421         unsigned long long int TotalHits = 0;
00422         unsigned long long int TotalReqs = 0;   
00423         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_BANKS; j++)
00424         {    
00425             TotalHits += hitsPerBank[j];
00426             TotalReqs += reqPerBank[j];
00427         }
00428         if (TotalReqs > 0)                      
00429             PH = TotalHits*1.0/TotalReqs;
00430         RRDsch = round(BL/(2*(RDsch+WRsch) * (1-PH)) * 10000 / SysClk) / 10;    
00431     }
00432    ((PowerStats*)pwr)->CalcPower(BNK_PRE, CLK_LO_PRE, CLK_LO_ACT, RDsch, WRsch, termRDsch, termWRsch, RRDsch);  
00433 }
00434 
00435 string Statistic::PrintAggregateStats( uint n)
00436 {
00437     stringstream str;
00438     str << dec; 
00439 /*    for (unsigned int i=0; i<NO_OF_THREADS; i++)      
00440     {           
00441         for (unsigned int j=0; j<NO_OF_BANKS; j++)
00442         { 
00443             str << "MC [" << n << "] " << "Total Request  for Thread " << i << ", bank " << j << " = " << reqPerThreadPerBank[i][j] << endl;
00444         }
00445     }
00446     str << endl;                        
00447
